rukus.text: ao banda anak del mean chomnue. chaur komaoy tropy sa mb tde robsa puok anak ning kaunchaw robsa puok anak thveu aoy puok anak ngbngoul khleatachhngay pi kar romluk tow champoh a l laoh aoy saoh . haey anaknea del thveu dauchnaoh anak teangnoh kuchea anak del khatabng

haey chaur puok anak brichcheak muoychamnuon ampi leaphosakkar del yeung ban phdal aoy puok anak mounnung sechakdeislab mokadl anaknea mneak knongchamnaom puok anak del cheaheto thveu aoy ke nung niyeay tha ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. brasenbae trong ponyearpel aoy khnhom b ndi ch tiet noh khnhom pitchea brichcheaktean haey khnhom nung sthet knongchamnaom anak del sang ampeula troem trauv cheaminkhan
haey a l laoh nung min ponyearpel aoy bokkol na mneak laey nowpel del sechakdeislab ban mokadl ke haey noh . haey a l laoh doeng chruotachreab nouv avei del puok anak br pru td
